principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix luxury fashion with artisan grit.
Emotion First: Every pixel must evoke 'Heritage' and 'Timelessness'.
Content is King: The product is the hero. Zoom in. Show the grain.
Negative Space: Luxury is defined by what you leave out.
Contrast: High contrast serif typography against deep dark backgrounds.

rules: Headings (h1, h2): Playfair Display. Font weight 400 or 600. Tracking tight (-0.02em).
Body: Manrope. Font weight 300 or 400. Leading relaxed.
Overlines/Labels: Manrope Uppercase. Tracking wide (0.2em). Text size xs.
Price/Numbers: Manrope or Cormorant Garamond (Italic for elegance).
typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cormorant+Garamond:ital,wght@0,300;0,400;0,600;1,400&family=Manrope:wght@200;300;400;500&family=Playfair+Display:ital,wght@0,400;0,600;1,400&display=swap');

usage_rules: Backgrounds: Use #0a0a0a for main pages, #121212 for cards/sections.
Text: Never use pure white (#ffffff). Use #e5e5e5 for headings, #a3a3a3 for body.
Gold Accent: Use sparingly for 'Add to Cart' buttons or price tags.
Gradients: NO generic gradients. Use noise textures or subtle radial glows.

rules: Avoid equal-width columns for product showcases.
Use 'The Tetris Grid': Mix col-span-2 with col-span-1 items.
Hero Section: Full height (min-h-screen) with immersive background image.
Product Grid: Masonry or staggered layout to feel organic, not mechanical.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or slightly rounded (rounded-sm). No pill shapes.
variants: Primary: Gold background (#d4af37), Black text, uppercase, tracking-widest.
Secondary: Transparent background, 1px border (#262626), White text.
Ghost: Text only, with an underline that animates on hover.

cards.style: Minimalist. No shadows by default. Image is king.
cards.hover: Scale image slightly (1.05). Fade in 'Quick View' button.

navigation.style: Floating glassmorphism or solid minimal bar.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) to the entire body to simulate film grain/paper.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, ambient shadows for floating elements: shadow-[0_20px_50px_rgba(0,0,0,0.5)].

motion.reveal: Fade up + Blur out (filter: blur(10px) -> blur(0px)) for text entrance.
motion.parallax: Parallax effect on hero images and section dividers.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. OVERRIDE COLORS: Update tailwind.config.js and index.css with the 'Obsidian & Gold' palette. Force Dark Mode.
3. USE LENIS: Install and wrap the app in Lenis for smooth scrolling. This is non-negotiable for luxury feel.
4. CUSTOMIZE SHADCN: Do not use default Shadcn styles. Remove rounded-md, make them sharp or rounded-sm. Change borders to dark grey.
5. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs for the specific categories. Do not use placeholders.
6. ANIMATIONS: Add 'motion.div' with 'initial={{opacity: 0, y: 20}} whileInView={{opacity: 1, y: 0}}' to all major sections.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. No gradients that look like default CSS.
Dark Mode Only: The site should feel like a dimly lit boutique store.
Accessibility: Ensure the Gold text is readable against Black (use larger font sizes if contrast is low).
Data-Testid: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
